attributes.action: repeal  the part of the Communications Act 2003 and the Communications (Television Licensing) Regulations 2005, relating to "a licence is required in order to install or use a television receiver to receive television programmes" and if necessary, fund from the National Lottery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC has reneged on its Charter and is no longer impartial.  We should not have to pay for something of which we disapprove.  However funding from the National lottery would ensure that the National Lottery fulfills its Charter, and reaches all people.
